first_translate: I won’t do  anything if you don’t want me to.
sorry...
it’s not that.
huh...?
was he always so weak around me?
I hate how my heart feels for him more each day...

hangle: 이러다가 시그렌을 보내줘야 할 때 못 보내주면 어떡해?
first_translate: if things keep going like this, what will happen when we have to part ways?

hangle: 시그렌을 향한 마음이 커지는 게 무서워.
first_translate: the thought of loving siegren even more than now scares me.
siegren.

hangle: 어쩌면 너하고 끝까지 가는 건 어려울지도 몰라.
first_translate: maybe it’ll be hard for us to go on until the end together.
let's talk about this later.
gosh...
even I think I’m being selfish right now.
does siegren feel tired of me as well?

hangle: 차라리 지금 질리면 나도 마음이 편할 텐데.
first_translate: that would make everything easier for me.
lady fiona?
isn’t she--
fiona lionhart?
and isn’t that the crown prince?
your highness.
long time no see.
uh... sorry.
when did your highness ever meet me before?
of course we’ve met! anyway, since abel isn’t here, let’s take advantage of our chance to speak alone.

hangle: 그건 일단 넘어가고, 아벨이 없는 지금이 대화할 기회다.
first_translate: what a shame.
what a shame.
I sent lady fiona such a nice gift.
a gift?

hangle: 난 황실에서 무언가를 받은 적이 없는데?
first_translate: but I never received any gifts from the palace.
wait a minute...
“the client was someone higher up than haylon.”
then that bastard was behind it after all!

hangle: 제가… 전하께 실례를 저지른 일이라도 있던가요?
first_translate: did I offend his highness somehow?
you did.
but the real problem was that damn siegren.
stop calling him names.
in any case, I had hoped that little surprise would bring some results.
unfortunately, nothing happened.

hangle: 그래도 내가 영애는 아벨 공작과 달리…
first_translate: still, unlike duke abel, I hold you in quite high regard.
still, unlike duke abel, I hold you in quite high regard.
as long as you stay out of trouble,
excuse me.
there were bugs sitting there.
how dare you treat me disrespectfully!
do you really believe you can act however you please just because duke abel favors you?! you’re nothing but a lowly illegitimate child!!!
at least nobody else saw that.
or are you counting on siegren protecting you?

hangle: 시그렌 녀석이 여차하면 널 지켜줄 거라 믿는 건가?
first_translate: or are you counting on siegren protecting you?
I protect myself.

hangle: 흥, 그래봤자 사생아 새끼들끼리 붙어먹은 주제에…
first_translate: hmph! you two bastards deserve each other.

hangle: 아니면, 설마 아벨 공작도 그 몸으로 꼬셔낸 건가?
first_translate: or maybe you seduced duke abel into taking care of you?

hangle: 진짜 혈육도 아닌데 아끼는 모습이 수상하다 싶더니.
first_translate: no wonder he treats her better than his own blood relatives.
argh!!!
oww!!!
alright then... I understand, your highness.

hangle: 세상에는 입으로 말이 아닌 쓰레기를 내뱉는 자들이 있는 법이니까요.
first_translate: after all, there are people in this world whose mouths spew trash instead of words.
this is crossing the line!!!
h-huh?
I dodged them both, as you can see.

hangle: 제 반사 신경이 그렇게 나쁜 편이 아니라서요.
first_translate: my reflexes aren’t bad at all.

hangle: 황족을 이렇게 건드리고 멀쩡할 것 같아?!
first_translate: who dares attack royalty like this?!
you shall be punished--!
go ahead and say whatever you’d like.

hangle: 사람들에게 가서, 본인 입으로 직접 말하세요.
first_translate: take yourself over to those people and tell them exactly what happened.

hangle: 전하보다 신분도 낮고 약해 보이는 영애에게 말싸움도 지고,
first_translate: they'll love hearing how you lost a verbal fight against a woman lower in status and weaker than you,
not to mention got beat by one.
kegh...
hey.
what are you doing?
can’t you put me down?!
oops, big mistake.
if I leave him like this, he might break the crown prince’s arm.

hangle: 이런 문제는 나중에 조용히 되갚아 줘야 한다고!
first_translate: problems like these need to be dealt with quietly afterward!
come on, let’s get moving.
and your highness.

hangle: 다음에는 쓰레기가 아닌 말을 내뱉으시길 바랍니다.
first_translate: next time, try speaking something besides garbage.
ngh...
why y-you b*tch!!! #@$%#$$@#
maybe I provoked him too far.
now he’ll probably become even more annoying...

hangle: 그 자식은 왜 자꾸 네 곁에 집적거리는 거야?
first_translate: why does he keep bothering you?
I wish I knew.
anyway, good job controlling yourself.

hangle: 저번에 이어 두 번째로 그놈의 손목을 부러뜨릴 뻔했어.
first_translate: for a second there, I almost broke his wrist again.

hangle: 너라면 진짜 할 것 같아서 겁나.
first_translate: knowing you, I wouldn’t doubt it either.
fiona...
hm? why?
are you mad?
earlier, you ran off from the balcony first.
I guess that’s how it looked to siegren.
well...
I hope you weren’t upset.
to be honest,
the idea of losing your affection...
...is terrifying.
so...
...I'm scared.
siegren...?
